nodes.text: Mef was a Gupin male who lived on the Forest Moon of Endor. By 3 ABY, Mef succeeded the previous ruler of the stronghold and became the Gupin king. When the wingless Gupin Mring-Mring left the Gupin homeland, his cousin Punt proclaimed himself to be king, and Mef died.
Mef was mentioned in "The Land of the Gupins," the eighth episode of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Bob Carrau and premiered on October 26, 1985.
